MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH48 postcode area of Torphichen and the surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10am. Repairs are taking longer than expected due to the complexity of the repairs required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1.20pm on Thursday 17th December 2020.
